content: SIW 8-22 ½” Cordless impact wrench Ultimate-class, high-torque cordless impact wrench with 1/2 friction ring anvil for structural bolting and anchoring (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Impact drivers and wrenches- - - ### FEATURES:Features On the Nuron battery platform – cordless impact wrenches without compromise thanks to longer-lasting batteries, time-saving accessories and a range of services to keep you productive, today and tomorrow Better ergonomics – slimmer, 1-3/4” shorter and over 1 lb. lighter than it its predecessor, helping to make your work more efficient when bolting all day Applications Bolting steel – structural steel connections, pipe flanges, equipment, A325 bolts (1/2” to 15/16” diameter) Setting HUS anchors in concrete – such as for baseplates, formwork props, handrails and temporary fixtures (1/2” to 3/4” diameter) Lag bolting in wood – such as for primary and secondary wood structures, wooden roofs or temporary structures (1/2” to ¾” diameter) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Anvil type: 1/2 friction ring Maximum torque: 443 ft-lbs (1); 738 ft-lbs (2) Nut busting torque: 1217 ft-lbs Technical Data | Anvil type | 1/2 friction ring | Maximum torque | 443 ft-lbs (1); 738 ft-lbs (2) | 1 | Nut busting torque | 1217 ft-lbs | Full hammering frequency | 2.950 impacts/minute | Number of gears | 2 | No load RPM | gear 1: 1250 rpm; gear 2: 1500 rpm | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 8.1 x 3.1 x 8.8 in | Tool body weight | 5.3 lb | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 101 dB (A) | 2 | Rated voltage | 21.6 V | Do not use the tool for applications where an exact torque or maximum torque is specified - there is a risk of over-tightening and damaging the screw or workpiece. | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 2251631 - Cordless impact wrench SIW 8-22 1/2 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SIW 8-22 Cordl. imp. wrench
tag_description: Ultimate-class, high-torque cordless impact wrench with 1/2 friction ring anvil for structural bolting and anchoring (Nuron battery platform)
